replies.body:
OCE you the real legends. Show those other regions who should have the bragging rights.

Also How does the 1v1 work and on what map?
NVM about my question I just read it fully 'Games will be played on Howling Abyss, and will be decided by first blood, first tower, or first to 100 CS.'

It says above that the doors open at 10am, but my ticket from Ticketek says they open at 9.30
How do I deal with this?

Also, anyone know the policies on bringing drinks/muesli bars?

Sorry about that - your ticket has the correct information. Doors open 90 minutes before the games start - we've updated the FAQ to reflect this.

Your bag will go through a quick search before you enter the arena. For the most part, drinks and muesli bars should be fine.

Awesome toots! Can't get through a day without muesli :D But if they don't make it past checkpoints, that's chill too. 

Thanks for the response ^^

Any riot staff here, please help. I have bought the tickets for the Sunday event. Because of some personal reason my friends and I would likely to be late for around 1 or 2 hours for this event, which is stated to start at 12:00pm. Because the event stated that it would last till 10:30pm, If my friends and I were to be late, would they still allow us into the event and receive the same merchandises?
Yep you will be able to come in and collect your swag bag throughout the day :)

Hi there, 
Was just wondering, me and 5 friends picked up the swag bag yesterday from Sylvia Park Hoyts yesterday (since they had some clearance issues upon arriving in NZ) was there supposed to be a skin code somewhere?
Thanks
Kind Regards
Hey Riot, are we able to leave early, and approximately when does the grand final game end?
Did it sell out? Can't buy tickets online anymore for tomorrow?
How the hack GPL they don't get  a facking interview after they wons ? ( OPL or Riot ) Do they hate Vietnamese or Thai ?!!!!!!....
Its because they don't speak English, and because we have no translators.
why no vods at all
You can watch the vods by clicking the "Watch Game" button to the right of the corresponding game in the Schedule section :)
when does the team fire ward skins and icons come out?

**F** U C K M E I N M Y A S CE {{champion:222}}
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
GO OCE! <3 xoxo
